thread.title: Shellie

author: Shellie
title: Shellie
text: I phoned in with a question regarding my order and was helped by Fernando. He provided excellent customer service beyond my expectations, which is reassuring when placing an online order. I am very happy with my order of a theater seating group for 4 and do recommend this company to anyone considering ordering furniture for your home theater. I also utilized the white glove service - again perfect service and well worth the price! If you need customer service I would definitely recommend seeking sales help from Fernando Reyes, 1-800-454-1801 ext.123
